text: The Hyundai Custo also known outside China as Hyundai Custin is a Minivan made by Hyundai through its joint venture with BAIC called Beijing Hyundai since 2021. == History and Features == The Hyundai Custo was launched in 2021 it is named after Jacques Coustoneau which is a French explorer and inventor. it has 7 seater and two row seating the minivan shares its design features with the Hyundai Tucson. It has a 1.5 and a 2.0 petrol engines and the minivan has only a 8-speed automatic transmission. == Markets == The Hyundai Custo is sold mainly in China but its also sold in Taiwan Vietnam and Phillipines as the Hyundai Custin. == References == Custo Category:2020s automobiles Category:Minivans
title: Hyundai Custo
